services.name: In-Home Consultation
services.description: Comprehensive in-home assessment and consultation covering all aspects of newborn care, sleep routines, feeding support, and family transition guidance.

services.name: 14 Days of Sleep Training Program (Online)
services.description: Comprehensive online sleep training program using gentle methods, tailored specifically to your child's needs.

services.name: Maternity Nurse Service
services.description: Professional maternity nurse care including 24-hour support, newborn care, feeding assistance, and family support.

services.name: Joey Room (2-3 years)
services.description: Nurturing care and early learning program for toddlers aged 2-3 years. Focus on developing independence, social skills, and language through play-based learning.

services.name: Wombat Room (3-4 years)
services.description: Pre-kindergarten program focusing on school readiness, language development, and social-emotional learning through structured activities.

services.name: Music Education Program
services.description: Specialized music and creative arts program led by qualified music educator, developing musical skills and creativity.

services.name: Preparatory Program
services.description: Foundation learning program for the youngest students, focusing on literacy, numeracy, and social development in a nurturing environment.

services.name: Primary Education (Years 1-6)
services.description: Comprehensive primary education combining academic excellence with character development, creative arts, and physical education.

services.name: Boarding Program
services.description: Comprehensive boarding program providing a home away from home with pastoral care, academic support, and life skills development.
